name: Kenku
description: Kenku are feathered humanoids that wander the world as vagabonds, driven by greed. They can perfectly imitate any sounds they hear.
special: Ambusher. In the first round of combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surpsied. Mimicry. The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (insight) check.
